alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:17PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lake, northwestern Orange and northwestern Volusia Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake George to Mascotte. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Leesburg, and Eustis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
